pyqgis_plugin.name: Checklist checker
pyqgis_plugin.about:
# QGIS Checklist checker
A QGIS3 plugin for checking checklists
## Development
This plugin uses [pipenv] and [paver] for development.
An easy way to get started is to (fork and) clone this repo, install pipenv and `pipenv install --dev` it!
### Deploying locally
Call the `deploy` task:
``` pipenv run paver deploy ```
### Publishing a new version
TBD
[pipenv]: https://pipenv.pypa.io/en/latest/ [paver]: https://pythonhosted.org/Paver/index.html
## Attribution
This plugin uses icons from the [Font Awesome] project. Icons are used as-is, without any modification, in accordance with their [license]
[Font Awesome]: https://fontawesome.com/ [license]: https://fontawesome.com/license
